title: How to Block Someone on Bumble: With and Without Reporting

steps.title: Open Bumble.
steps.content: Open Bumble. This app icon looks like a beehive on a yellow background.

steps.title: Navigate to the profile you want to block.
steps.content: Navigate to the profile you want to block. You'll most likely use this method if you're browsing your Matches and find someone you don't want to connect with. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Hide & Report.
steps.content: Tap Hide & Report . It's at the bottom of their profile. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select a reason.
steps.content: Select a reason. If you don't want to report the profile, tap I'm just not interested . Alternatively, you can select any of the other reasons to send a report. This person will no longer appear in your dating feed.

steps.title: Open Bumble.
steps.content: Open Bumble. This app icon looks like a beehive on a yellow background.

steps.title: Navigate to the conversation with the person you want to block.
steps.content: Navigate to the conversation with the person you want to block. To do this, tap the conversation bubble icon in the lower right corner of your screen, then tap the conversation to open it. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . You'll see this three-dot menu icon in the top right corner of the screen. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Hide & Report.
steps.content: Tap Hide & Report . It's at the bottom of their profile. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Select a reason.
steps.content: Select a reason. If you don't want to report the profile, tap I'm just not interested . Alternatively, you can select any of the other reasons to send a report. Once you've blocked someone in a conversation with you, the conversation will disappear from their chat history and they will see a notice that "(Your Name) has ended the chat." [6] X Research source
